metadata.title: CoziNest Ceramic Tabby Cat Figurine Relaxed Gray Kitten Adorable Kitty Collectible Miniatures Dollhouse Hand Painted Animal Home Decor or Gift for Cat Lovers, 1.3in x 1.5in x 1.5in (W-L-H)
features: HANDCRAFTED : Made from ceramic, with the glazed finish to create a nice polished look. Thai people have been blessed with considerable dexterity. While making handicrafts they will not count their time and this is the main reason why they can nearly reach perfection

ADORABLE PIECE : This darling kitten with a delightful visage will surely capture your heart and put a smile on your lips. You can mix and match with other animals of feline or cat family decorative pieces to create a menagerie in your own home.
UNIQUE DESIGN : Every piece is slightly different since they are handmade. As such is the nature of the items, details may vary from piece to piece thus no two are alike making them special indeed.
CARE AND HANDLING : We suggest filling a bowl with warm water and a very mild dishwashing liquid. Dip a very soft cloth into the water and gently clean the porcelain figurine until it's free of dirt.
NICE DECORATION : Used as decorative figurines in terrariums, dioramas, fairy gardens, and dollhouses. they are also great for DIY arts and crafts projects.
description: This sculpture is a finely crafted of Thai skilled artisans. The high quality miniature ceramic cat figurine is a unique piece of art. It takes a lot of experience, skill and attention to each tiny detail to produce this wonderful figure. Each miniature is entirely hand painted by talented artists using a very thin brush with only a few hairs. Making no two figures exactly alike. This added layer of uniqueness is another reason collectors love our ceramic cat figurines. We have a variety of collectible items that will surely stand out among your most treasured collections. Nature-inspired piece of art. You can combine with your feline or cat family decors and figurines. The kitten is molded into its natural stretching pose as if waking up from slumber. This figurine is a great decorative piece for the home, school, pet store, or a veterinarian's office. A wonderful gift to family or friends for any occasion.
